changes.rscadd: Hidden levers can be detected by looking around, similar to a trap. Only visible to those who meet the perception DC of the lever.

changes.qol: Roles that know the keep's hidden door passwords now have it added to their memories.

changes.balance: Hidden doors and levers now have a perception DC to be used. A standard hidden door/lever has a DC of 10. A keep door/lever is 14. Thieves Guild members and Assassins get a +2 bonus to this check.

changes.map: Re-added Keep architectural plans to Vanderlin's archive room. These are used to reveal the locations of the hidden doors.
